DOC.brief_title: 4-PBA : Will Increase Level Alpha 1-Antitrypsin ( AAT ) Persons With AAT Deficiency ?
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether 4-PBA significantly increase serum Z AAT level AAT-deficient individual without evidence hepatocellular injury ass effect liver injury .
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 Serum A1PI level < 11uM appropriate genetic phenotype/genotype 5 10 subject must document laboratory evidence liver disease Willingness withhold Prolastin therapy 6 week prior screen throughout 4PBA dose period ( 3 month ) Any cause liver disease Alpha1 Antitrypsin deficiency Evidence advance liver disease HIV positive Use systemic steroid , ursodeoxycholic acid ( Actigall , Urso ) , herbs prior 6 month
